[{"id":"8e6155f1-8a66-471e-8b29-a29cec2e571a","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: merge_change","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"55c8b973-edbd-4ad0-a4c1-4bc0e9992061","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"merge_change","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function deals with side effects. When functions are called, they may modify global variables or mutable objects (like lists or class attributes). This function checks if the called functions (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"callList","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") have registered any such "Changes" in the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ChangeManager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":". It collects all these modifications and merges them into a single set of updates associated with the current line of code.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"fb632310-6df8-4759-abc5-94e6c751c4e0","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Why this matters
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Static analysis must be conservative. If you call ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"modify_config()","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and that function changes ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"config.debug","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"True","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", the analyzer needs to know that ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"after","styles":{"italic":true}},{"type":"text","text":" this call, ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"config.debug","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"True","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".
However, if you call ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"two","styles":{"italic":true}},{"type":"text","text":" functions, or if the call target is ambiguous (it could be Function A or Function B), the variable might have different values. ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"merge_change","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" handles this ambiguity by performing a ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"union","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" of all possible outcomes.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"30f18619-8ea7-4e23-b126-b884f0f289ab","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"How it works","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"da3fcf92-af5d-4448-8f3b-7c2d47ebe43c","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Iterate Calls:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It loops through every potential function identified by ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"resolve_call","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (often just one, but multiple if ambiguity exists).","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"99b05762-ab86-4286-9737-30e30a064997","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Retrieve Changes:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It asks the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"change_manager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" for any side effects recorded for that function.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3828e536-4732-4766-8c8d-529db158e588","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Merge Logic:","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[{"id":"3f2460be-8386-4af0-8ec6-25fd9c8d5343","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It creates a dictionary ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"outPoint","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"7ecb6ba6-b04a-4991-bf81-dadfa0aeb388","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"If Function A changes ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"x","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"1","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and Function B changes ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"x","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"2","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", it merges these into ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"x -> {1, 2}","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"548e5b87-f35c-4ca6-a0f3-c6345b8a44e0","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It uses ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"union","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to combine these sets of potential values.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"c23fa1fe-045f-4c3e-a19e-ab614d6435ac","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Output:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It returns a dictionary of ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ChangeItem","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" objects, representing the net effect of the function call(s) on the program state.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"bd0b0110-829c-4d19-9792-2bf8c1c91305","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Example Scenario
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Code:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"97f44c08-7f22-4dd3-a9c2-84f61ce16755","type":"codeBlock","props":{"language":"python"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"if random():
    f = func_A  # Changes global X to 1
else:
    f = func_B  # Changes global X to 2

f()  # Call site","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"cbb254f8-c85d-4999-82aa-9e2e46406784","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Analysis at ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"f()","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":":","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"bc3f1fcc-22b4-4369-b1de-e236fed19c0a","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"callList","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" contains ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"[func_A, func_B]","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f7f11578-bddb-4dcf-805d-65c9be31ca6b","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"merge_change","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" checks ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"func_A","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" -> finds change ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"X=1","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"17e12ec8-1e6e-4e24-86e7-a04d10d3f1fc","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"merge_change","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" checks ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"func_B","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" -> finds change ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"X=2","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"08368402-930a-4b57-a41a-5c3447811670","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It merges them: ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"X={1, 2}","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"7439e1b7-20aa-44c4-b4b9-ae1f0b99ce25","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The analyzer now knows that after this line, ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"X","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is either 1 or 2.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"1caeca6d-068c-4a5b-b948-dcdc6ac80cf1","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
